LOG: https://www.dropbox.com/s/xezvclm6nyr9pov/output_log.txt?dl=0

So whenever my rocket explodes on the launchpad (kraken attacks probably caused by massive size) and I try to revert, it wont let me. Or even go to space center for that matter. So I am forced to restart the game. I can click but it wont do anything.

MODS: (many parts in part packs deleted)

RSS and RO

Editor Extensions

FASA

FAR

Hangar Extender

KJR

KWRocketry

Mechjeb2

Near Future Solar

Novapunch2

NRAP (procedural payload)

Procedural Fairings

Procedural Parts

RealFuels

Smokescreen

Tweakscale
I had a similar problem where the escape key did nothing. Do you have a mod that bundles Toolbar; that was the problem for me.
